channel.title: Variance RSPS: Building Entertainment
channel.description:
[IMG]http://variance-rsps.com/imgs/logo.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/voizM7m.png[/img] [I][SIZE=1]Variance is a newly launched server. While we are just a small, knit-close community right now - we are hoping to expand![/SIZE][/I]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Y0HlFwE.png[/img] [URL=http://variance-rsps.com]Website & Community[/URL] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PtWEKPH.png[/img] [URL=http://variance-rsps.com/playnow.html]Play Now[/URL]
[B]Features:[/B]
[ul][*]Interactive Achievement System [*]Loads of bosses, minigames, and skilling zones to choose from [*]All skills trainable, Duo Slayer for example [*]Dwarf Cannon [*]Great PVP (player vs player) and PVN (player vs npc) [*]"Not so fast, not too slow" XP rates [*]Clan Chat [*]Regular, consistent updates [*]Premium content for donators [*]Clue Scrolls [*]Q&A Bot for rewards [*]Loads more![/ul]
[B]A small preview of what we offer:[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hMx2guo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hHn2nB2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gQ8XBND.png[/img]

item.title: Variance RSPS: Building Entertainment
item.dc:creator: @Unleashed_Revolution Unleashed Revolution
item.description:
@Unleashed_Revolution wrote:

Starting development on Dungeoneering. Since the brief launch of the server, there has been over 25 updates. Some minor, some a bit large. Just showing that things are being done! Updating the advertisement soon with new information/pictures.

Read full topic

[I][SIZE=1]Variance is a newly launched server. While we are just a small, knit-close community right now - we are hoping to expand![/SIZE][/I]

[ul][]Interactive Achievement System
[]Loads of bosses, minigames, and skilling zones to choose from
[]All skills trainable, Duo Slayer for example
[]Dwarf Cannon
[]Great PVP (player vs player) and PVN (player vs npc)
[]“Not so fast, not too slow” XP rates
[]Clan Chat
[]Regular, consistent updates
[]Premium content for donators
[]Clue Scrolls
[]Q&A Bot for rewards
[]Loads more![/ul]
